item.description:
Hello everyone! Sorry we had to postpone this from the 24th.
Hopefully we'll still have beautiful weather for this hike, even if the leaves are going to be a bit past. I'm going to find a good loop trail that takes 1.5-2 hours in the Natchaug State Forest. We will meet at my place and carpool the 10 minute drive up to the trailhead itself. You should wear solid hiking boots and bring water/snacks that you would like. :D If it rains again, we probably will reschedule, but if it merely drizzles, we'llstill go.

Please be on time, since we will be leaving for the trailhead no later than 2.15.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Autumnal Hike Redux
